name: 6Senses Serviced Apartment & Homestay Opera House
address: 881 Hong Ha Street, Chuong Duong Ward, Hoan Kiem District, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
6Senses Serviced Apartment & Homestay Opera House offers accommodation in Hanoi. The accommodation features a hot tub. National Museum of Vietnamese History is 100 metres from the property. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property.

The accommodation has a seating and dining area. There is also a kitchen, equipped with a microwave and fridge. Towels are offered.

Vietnam Revolution Museum is 200 metres from 6Senses Serviced Apartment. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 22 km from the property.
